name: Drifting Hearts
description:
Dreaming in the Sheets,
Horny on the Streets.

For years you have honed your racing skills. It all comes down to this race. It is time...to pick up some hot racers! Approach your fellow racers on the track to flirt with them, but keep your eyes on the track!

a game by Anastasie Janot, Luisa Höhne, Sascha Reinhold and Jannik Boysen.

music by Martin 'Pladde' Platte.

made accoring to the theme "Mixing Genres" in 48 for the IFgameSH Autumn Jam and the Mix and Game Jam.
